channel.title: Vishwas Navada's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Vishwas Navada's Blog

item.title: Arduplane
item.description: Hi fellas, this is an old project which I built in 2015 it’s an Ardunio based RC aircraft which uses RF modules for communication and arduino as main brain. The details of this project is in intructables.com Code and other files are on Github

item.title: About me!
item.description: I’m an electronics and instrumentation engineer graduated from Bangalore Institute of Technology in 2017. I worked as Embedded Hardware Engineer in Openwater.in a spin-off startup from Instrumentation and Applied Physics department of Indian Institue of Science, Bangalore. Currently I’m working as a Mixed Signal Design Engineer at Robert Bosch Centre For Cyber Physical Systems, IISc, Bangalore

item.title: Introduction to tutorials
item.description: “These are things or experiments that I did based on my knowledge and I feel it might help someone to understand few things by actually trying it out. If you are accidently here, you can go to Home“

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post. In this blog I would like to tell about my adventures and experiments in electronics and other stuffs.
